claims.object: Mapping protein interactions under physiological conditions

surface_layer.definition: A mass spectrometry-based technique for identifying protein interactions by separating protein complexes.

deep_layer.mechanism: Protein complexes are separated by chromatography, then analyzed by mass spectrometry to identify interacting proteins.
deep_layer.origin: Developed to study protein interactions in a high-throughput manner.

examples: CF-MS analysis of human cell lysates
Mapping protein interactions in yeast using CF-MS
